summary.para: The JinxBot.Controls namespace contains classes to efficiently build rich user interfaces centered around chat uses. Classes such as the DisplayBox and ChatBox enable design-time support for these controls within your project, and coupled with easy-to-understand utility classes such as the ChatNode, building a rich user interface should take minimal time.

Additionally, the JinxBot chat displays are extensible by creating new ChatNode renderer classes. By implementing the logic of chat node rendering into a separate class, the rendering can be decoupled from the display box itself, enabling users to create custom chat node displays. This is achieved through the ChatNodeRendererAttribute, which should be applied to the custom ChatNode-derived class.
